summary:
Interesting research: â€œHacking Back the AI-Hacker: Prompt Injection as a Defense Against LLM-driven Cyberattacksâ€œ:
Large language models (LLMs) are increasingly being harnessed to automate cyberattacks, making sophisticated exploits more accessible and scalable.  In response, we propose a new defense strategy tailored to counter LLM-driven cyberattacks.  We introduce Mantis, a defensive framework that exploits LLMsâ€™ susceptibility to adversarial inputs to undermine malicious operations...
title: Prompt Injection Defenses Against LLM Cyberattacks
